text: If you?re passionate about what it is you do, then you?re going to be looking for everything you can to get better at it.-Jack Canfield
One of the secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others.-Lewis Carroll
The mind is everything. What you think you become.-Buddha
God never sends us more than we can handle.-Mother Theresa
No man can become rich without himself enriching others.-Andrew Carnegie
What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other? - George Eliot
But knowing depends on the time spent looking!-Rumi
There are two mistakes one can make along the road to truth not going all the way, and not starting. - Buddha

Eat, drink and be merry (for tomorrow we die).-Spanish Proverbs
A therapist doesn't heal, he lets healing be.-A Course in Miracles
What you are aware of you are in control of; what you are not aware of is in control of you.- Anthony de Mello
When the mind is not perceived, it doesn?t exist. ?Francis Lucille

Seek out your faults and others' merits. Seeking others' faults is dire sin.-Sai Baba

Life ain't always beautiful, but it's a beautiful ride.- Gary Allan

You don't live forever, at least in this life.-Rama

You paint your own picture of what you want, then make it a reality. Its not easy but... It's not impossible

Our view of the world is truly shaped by what we decide to hear.- William James
The best things in life are free.
Just because we are working hard does not mean we are making anything happen.? Wayne Muller
Please move your dark cloud. It's blocking my happiness.
ï¿½As J. Krishnamurti said, the highest form of human intelligence is the ability to observe yourself.ï¿½-Deepak Chopra
Be thankful when you don't know something, for it gives you the opportunity to learn.
A great gift - a gift of Dharma conquers all gifts.-Buddha

Most folks are about as happy as they make their minds up to be.- Abraham Lincoln

ï¿½No one can get inner peace by pouncing on it.ï¿½-Harry Emerson Fosdick
Accept life as it comes and you will find a blessing.-Sri Nisargadatta

A major source of stress in life is worrying too much about minor things.
Tension is who you think you should be.  Relaxation is who you are.  - Anonymous
The greatest human quest is to know what one must do in order to become a human being.-Immanuel Kant

Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person. - Mother Teresa
In a corrupt age, when prayers are not answered, that itself is the answer.- Muso Kokushi

Happiness is something that you are and it comes from the way you think.-Wayne Dyer

But then if I do not strive, who will?-Lei Tzu

Man cannot discover new oceans until he has courage to lose sight of the shore.
